lead_paragraph: Smoking may not be permitted in Prudential Center, the Nets’ temporary home in Newark, but advertising is, and the Nets have a new sponsor — Zippo lighters.
snippet: Smoking may not be permitted in Prudential Center, the Nets’ temporary home in Newark, but advertising is, and the Nets have a new sponsor — Zippo lighters.

headline.main: Nets Add Zippo as Team Sponsor
headline.seo: Nets Sign Zippo Lighters as Newest Sponsor
headline.print_headline: Nets Add Zippo As Team Sponsor
